post.body: Nope. I was swaying along with them
They finish cleaning up before the morning rush.
Awesome! I'll put you down then!
I didn't know Moxie was available there. Nice!
Heading home. Firworks everywhere, people honking their horns, absolute madness. You'd think the second coming of Christ just happened.
And Rich put on some Auld Lang Syne... we're all singing along
And it is now January 1, 2009! HAPPY NEW YEAR! May we all have a wonderful and successful new year!
2 minutes til 2009. @bwayzealot is a party pooper. :P
4 minutes til 2009 here on the east coast!
Baaaad cold. For the next few days I'm gonna wish I was dead.
I love having a LCD TV. Easy to stow in the trunk and bring over to a friend's when needed. Technology has come a long way over the years!
Mmmm, Lisa Lampanelli and a can of moxie. Great way to spend the fina hours of 2008.
I'm getting sicker.
Took a picture of the sunset from my yard. http://i44.tinypic.com/2nu0ehj.jpg
I'm coming down with something. Wonderful!
Well, one window has to be completely replaced. Frame, panes, etc. Everything.
Window guy is here to fix my windows. Thank god.
Trying out Windows 7 Beta 1 for fun.
Apparently tentacle rape has a flavor. http://tinyurl.com/9fzdva
Internet is back up.
